title: Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room", December 10, 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with instructions throughout; inscribed in graphite in stamp: 537-1; 1/2"=1'-0"; BLOCK / TERRACE / GAME ROOM / AND BAR; HUNT / CD. [overlapping]; 12/10/35 MERRICH L.&B. / 12/30/35 1 HART L.&B. / " 1 WRIGHT L.&B.
description: Plan and elevations for terrace game room. Double-door to dining room at center of north wall. Buffet server at left of entrance and perpendicular to wall. Planter along north wall at left and extending to west wall; curve at corner between north and west walls. Bar near west wall; back bar along wall with glass shelf and cabinets below, glass brick wall behind. Glass brick south wall with flower planter, lower left. Large modular sofa on south wall near right; sofa extends onto east wall and conforms to curve of corner. Flower planter in south east corner behind sofa; frosted glass brick wall behind sofa lit from below. Sunken circular aquarium in front of sofa at right, with lighting. Radio and storage for bridge tables on north wall at right. Hassocks scattered on floor of room. Plan for linoleum design. Door to sunroom on east wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room", December 10, 1935.
December 10, 1935. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-556.
